creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: old man with white hair, wearing glasses and brick red cloak and cap, seated in a chair with a tall back at a table, looking at a book; stacks of books and candlestick on table; books against chair and on floor
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled [scholar with books]
